name: Demographic Transitions
description: Learn about the Demographic Transition Model (DTM) by playing an interactive game. Play though each of the 5 stages and talk to characters to find out what their lives are like in each respective stage of society.   In this 30- to 45-minute adventure, learners will build mental models for each of the 5 stages of the DTM as they hunt and gather, work in a factory, drive girls to school, trade electronics on a global scale and experience life in a retirement village.
